TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Structure TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime Implements IDeserializationCallback, IEquatable(Of TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime), ISerializable
type TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime = struct interface ISerializable interface IDeserializationCallback

summary.span: 提供有关特定时区中特定时间更改（例如从夏时制更改为标准时间，或者从标准时间更改为夏时制）的信息。

span.span: Provides information about a specific time change, such as the change from daylight saving time to standard time or vice versa, in a particular time zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用结构来指示何时从标准时间转换为夏时制, 或从夏时制转换回标准时间。You can use the structure to indicate when a transition from standard time to daylight saving time, or from daylight saving time back to standard time, occurs. 此结构支持固定日期规则和浮动日期规则。This structure supports both fixed-date rules and floating-date rules. 使用固定日期规则表示在特定月份的特定日期发生的时间转换 (例如凌晨2:00Use fixed-date rules for time transitions that occur on a specific day of a specific month (such as 2:00 A.M. 11月3日)。on November 3). 在特定月份的特定周的特定一天发生的时间转换使用浮动日期规则 (例如凌晨2:00Use floating-date rules for time transitions that occur on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month (such as 2:00 A.M. 11月第一个星期日。on the first Sunday of November). 下表比较了在固定日期和浮动日期转换中使用的属性:The following table compares the properties used in fixed-date and floating-date transitions: ||月份Month|周Week|天Day|时间Time| |-|-----------|----------|---------|----------| |固定日期规则Fixed-date rule||不可用N/A||| |浮动日期规则Floating-date rule||||| 对于固定日期和浮动日期转换, 该属性获取发生时间更改的时间。For both fixed-date and floating-date transitions, the property gets the time at which the time change occurs. 对于从标准到夏令时的转换, 这是时区的标准时间值。For transitions from standard to daylight saving time, this is the time zone's standard time value. 对于从夏时制转换到标准时间的转换, 这是时区的夏时制值。For transitions from daylight saving to standard time, this is the time zone's daylight saving time value. 这是一个值, 该值的日期部分被忽略; 年份、月份和日期值始终必须等于1。This is a value whose date component is ignored; its year, month, and day value must always equal 1. > [!NOTE] > 结构的实例是不可变的。An instance of the structure is immutable. 创建对象后, 不能修改其值。Once an object has been created, its values cannot be modified. 可以通过`static`调用 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 和方法创建一个对象来创建固定或浮动日期规则。A object can be created by calling the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) and methods to create a fixed or floating-date rule, respectively. 然后, 将开始和结束对象作为参数提供给方法, 以创建包含此转换时间信息的新调整规则。The starting and ending objects are then supplied as parameters to the method to create a new adjustment rule that includes this transition time information. 对象的和属性返回对象。 The and properties of an object return a object.

summary.span: 定义一个使用固定日期规则的日期更改（即，发生在特定月份的特定日期的时间更改）。

span.span: Defines a time change that uses a fixed-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific month).
Data about the time change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建一个固定日期规则 (即在特定月份的特定日期发生的时间更改)。This method creates a fixed-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific month). 例如, 在10月28日发生的时间更改始终遵循固定日期规则。For example, a time change that always occurs on October 28 follows a fixed-date rule. 对于从标准时间到夏令时的转换, 该`timeOfDay`参数表示时区的标准时间中的转换时间。For transitions from standard time to daylight saving time, the `timeOfDay` argument represents the time of the transition in the time zone's standard time. 对于从夏时制转换到标准时间的转换, 它表示时区夏令时的转换时间。For transitions from daylight saving time to standard time, it represents the time of the transition in the time zone's daylight saving time. 请注意, 这是年份、月份和日期值都必须等于1的值。Note that this is a value whose year, month, and date values must all equal 1. ## Examples 下面的示例使用固定日期规则和浮动日期规则为虚时区创建时区转换。The following example creates time zone transitions for an imaginary time zone by using both a fixed-date rule and a floating-date rule. 固定日期规则定义从凌晨2:00 开始的时区调整。The fixed-date rule defines a time zone adjustment that starts at 2:00 A.M. 3月15日结束, 3:00 A.M. 结束。on March 15 and ends at 3:00 A.M. 1955 1900 年11月15日。on November 15 for the years 1900 to 1955. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#2)]

summary.span: 定义一个使用浮动日期规则的日期更改（即，发生在特定月份的特定星期的特定星期几的时间更改）。

span.span: Defines a time change that uses a floating-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month).
Data about the time change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建一个浮动日期规则 (即在特定月份的特定周的特定一天发生的时间更改)。This method creates a floating-date rule (that is, a time change that occurs on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month). 例如, 10 月最后一个星期日发生的时间更改采用浮动日期规则。For example, a time change that occurs on the last Sunday of October follows a floating-date rule. 对于从标准时间到夏令时的转换, 该`timeOfDay`参数表示时区的标准时间中的转换时间。For transitions from standard time to daylight saving time, the `timeOfDay` argument represents the time of the transition in the time zone's standard time. 对于从夏时制转换到标准时间的转换, 它表示时区夏令时的转换时间。For transitions from daylight saving time to standard time, it represents the time of the transition in the time zone's daylight saving time. 请注意, 这是年份、月份和日期值都必须等于1的值。Note that this is a value whose year, month, and date values must all equal 1. ## Examples 下面的示例使用固定日期规则和浮动日期规则为虚时区创建时区转换。The following example creates time zone transitions for an imaginary time zone by using both a fixed-date rule and a floating-date rule. 浮动日期规则定义从凌晨2:00 开始的时区调整。The floating-date rule defines a time zone adjustment that starts at 2:00 A.M. 在3月的最后一个星期日结束, 结束于凌晨3:00。on the last Sunday of March and ends at 3:00 A.M. 1956年10月第四个星期日。on the fourth Sunday in October for the years 1956 onward. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取发生时间更改的日期。

span.span: Gets the day on which the time change occurs.
The day on which the time change occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅 `true`当属性为时, 属性才返回有效的值。 The property returns a valid value only if the property is `true`. 属性值对应于方法的`day`参数值。 The property value corresponds to the value of the `day` parameter of the method. 如果其值大于转换月中的天数, 则在该月的最后一天发生转换。If its value is greater than the number of days in the month of the transition, the transition occurs on the last day of the month. 属性指示应用固定日期规则的月中的第几天 (例如, 4 月15日)。The property indicates the day of the month on which a fixed-date rule is applied (for example, April 15). 与此相反, 该属性指示应用了浮动日期规则的一周中的某一天 (例如, 11 月的第二个星期日)。In contrast, the property indicates the day of the week on which a floating-date rule is applied (for example, the second Sunday of November). ## Examples 下面的示例枚举在本地计算机上找到的时区, 并显示所有固定日期转换的转换时间信息。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for all fixed-date transitions. 时间信息包括发生时间更改的日期。The time information includes the day on which the time change occurs. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅 `false`当属性为时, 属性才返回有效的值。 The property returns a valid value only if the property is `false`. 属性指示应用了浮动日期规则的一周中的哪一天 (例如, 11 月的第二个星期日)。The property indicates the day of the week on which a floating-date rule is applied (for example, the second Sunday of November). 相反, 该属性指示应用固定日期规则的月中的第几天 (例如4月15日)。In contrast, the property indicates the day of the month on which a fixed-date rule is applied (for example, April 15). ## Examples 下面的示例枚举在本地计算机上找到的时区, 并显示所有浮点日期转换的转换时间信息。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for all floating-date transitions. 时间信息包括发生时间更改的星期几。The time information includes the day of the week on which the time change occurs. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定两个对象是否相等, 此方法将执行属性的属性比较。To determine whether the two objects are equal, this method performs a property-by-property comparison. 仅当当前`true` 对象`other` 和对象的每个对象的六个属性值都具有相同的值时, 方法才会返回。The method returns `true` only if the current object and the `other` object have identical values for each of the object's six property values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示对方法的调用。The following example illustrates calls to the method. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是在固定日期和时间（如 11 月 1 日）还是在浮动日期和时间（如 10 月的最后一个星期日）发生时间更改。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the time change occurs at a fixed date and time (such as November 1) or a floating date and time (such as the last Sunday of October).

value.span: 如果时间更改规则为固定日期，则为 ；如果时间更改规则为浮动日期，则为 。

span.span: if the time change rule is fixed-date; if the time change rule is floating-date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 固定日期规则表示转换在应用了调整规则的每年的同一日期和时间进行。A fixed-date rule indicates that the transition occurs on the same date and time of each year to which the adjustment rule applies. 例如, 每11月3日发生的时间更改都遵循固定日期规则。For example, a time change that occurs every November 3 follows a fixed-date rule. 浮动日期规则指示该转换在应用了调整规则的每年特定月份的特定周的特定一天发生。A floating-date rule indicates that the transition occurs on a specific day of a specific week of a specific month for each year to which the adjustment rule applies. 例如, 在11月份的第一个星期日发生的时间更改遵循浮动日期规则。For example, a time change that occurs on the first Sunday of November follows a floating-date rule. 属性的值确定对象的哪些属性具有有效值。The value of the property determines which properties of a object have valid values. 下表指示属性的值影响的属性。The following table indicates which properties are affected by the value of the property. |TransitionTime 属性TransitionTime property|IsFixedDateRule = trueIsFixedDateRule = true|IsFixedDateRule = falseIsFixedDateRule = false| |-----------------------------|-----------------------------|------------------------------| |`Day`|有效Valid|用Unused| |`DayOfWeek`|用Unused|有效Valid| |`Week`|用Unused|有效Valid| |`Month`|有效Valid|有效Valid| |`TimeOfDay`|有效Valid|有效Valid| ## Examples 下面的示例列出了本地系统上所有可用时区的夏令时和夏令时之间的转换时间。The following example lists the transition times to and from daylight saving time for all time zones that are available on the local system. 对于具有固定日期规则的时区, 它会显示来自对象属性的转换时间信息。For time zones with fixed-date rules, it displays transition time information from the properties of the object. 对于不包含固定日期规则的时区, 它使用表示当前系统日历的对象来确定转换的实际开始日期和结束日期。For time zones without fixed-date rules, it uses a object that represents the current system calendar to determine the actual start and end dates of the transition. 该示例将结果显示到控制台。The example displays the results to the console. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/example1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/example1.vb#5)]

[!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取发生时间更改的小时、分钟和秒。

span.span: Gets the hour, minute, and second at which the time change occurs.

value.span: 发生时间更改的当天的时间。

span.span: The time of day at which the time change occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于从标准时间到夏令时的转换, 该值表示时区的标准时间中的转换时间。For transitions from standard time to daylight saving time, the value represents the time of the transition in the time zone's standard time. 对于从夏时制转换到标准时间的转换, 它表示时区夏令时的转换时间。For transitions from daylight saving time to standard time, it represents the time of the transition in the time zone's daylight saving time. 属性仅定义时间更改的时间, 但不定义其日期。The property defines only the time of a time change, but not its date. 日期由固定规则 更改的和属性以及浮动规则更改的、和属性确定。The date is determined by the and properties for fixed-rule changes, and by the , , and properties for floating-rule changes. 忽略此值的日期部分; 年、月和日的值始终为1。The date component of this value is ignored; the value of the year, month, and day is always 1. 属性用于固定日期和浮动日期转换。The property is used for both fixed-date and floating-date transitions. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举在本地计算机上找到的时区, 并显示具有调整规则的时区的转换时间信息。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for those time zones that have adjustment rules. 时间信息包括发生时间更改的时间。The time information includes the time of day at which the time change occurs. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int Week { get; }
.property instance int32 Week
Public ReadOnly Property Week As Integer
public: property int Week { int get(); };
member this.Week : int

summary.span: 获取时间更改发生在月中的第几个星期。

span.span: Gets the week of the month in which a time change occurs.

value.span: 时间更改发生在月中的第几个星期。

span.span: The week of the month in which the time change occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值仅用于浮动日期规则的时间更改。The value of the property is used only for time changes with floating-date rules. 有效值的范围为1到5。Valid values can range from 1 to 5. 属性定义发生时间更改的月份。The property defines the month in which the time change occurs. 属性确定发生转换的周。The property determines the week on which the transition occurs. 属性定义发生转换的周日期。The property defines the day of the week on which the transition occurs. 确定属性的值, 如下表所示。The value of the property is determined as shown in the following table. |如果 Week 属性值为If the Week property value is|转换发生于The transition occurs on| |-----------------------------------|------------------------------| |11| 中值的第一个匹配项。The first occurrence of the value in .| |22| 中值的第二个匹配项。The second occurrence of the value in .| |33| 中值的第三个匹配项。The third occurrence of the value in .| |44| 中值的第四个匹配项。The fourth occurrence of the value in .| |55| 中值的最后一个匹配项。The last occurrence of the value in .| 例如, 如果在三月的第一个星期日发生转换, 则属性的值为1。For example, if a transition occurs on the first Sunday of March, the value of the property is 1. 如果它发生在3月的最后一个星期日, 则属性的值为5。If it occurs on the last Sunday of March, the value of the property is 5. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举在本地计算机上找到的时区, 并显示所有浮点日期转换的转换时间信息。The following example enumerates the time zones found on the local computer and displays transition time information for all floating-date transitions. 时间信息包括发生时间更改的月中的第几周。The time information includes the week of the month in which the time change occurs. 该示例还定义一个`WeekOfMonth`枚举, 用于显示表示属性的序号值 (而不是整数) 的字符串。The example also defines a `WeekOfMonth` enumeration to display a string that represents the ordinal value of the property rather than an integer. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.TransitionTime.Class.vb#4)]
